msgSender().details: Uniswap v4 periphery contracts implement a callback pattern which lose the original msg.sender caller context. This view function provides a way for integrating contracts (e.g. hooks) to access the original caller address.

returns._0: The address of the original caller

msgSender().notice: Returns the address of the original caller (msg.sender)
